room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We chose the Mafia escape room. It was a blast - well thought out with lots of interesting clues and challenging props. Four of us went together and we were joined by three strangers who really helped with solving the clues. It took all of us and we worked well together. Clever ideas!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: The Escape Room provided us with so many exciting challenges to escape each room then to be met with more thought-provoking clues. It was a blast to do with our group who has known each other for many years. I can't wait to try another themed escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We had a great time - we did the Mafia room. We made it out with 5 minutes to spare, thanks to the helpful clues! I would definitely recommend doing this. We want to go back and try the Pirates  room.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: If you like to be challenged, then the Mafia room is for you! I have done a few escape room games, always great fun! You will want to go again. Addicting.
